thread.section_title: Curtains on the Net Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Curtains on the Net | curtainsonthenet.com.au
thread.title: Lola Goody
thread.title_full: Curtains on the Net reviewed by Lola Goody

author: Lola Goody
title: Lola Goody
text: Fantastic - I did lots of searching, Curtains on the Net by far the cheapest. Phoned and received excellent customer service, help and advice. Curtain quality - perfect. Ordered and delivered to my door 2 days later, and I'm on the Gold Coast I have recommended Curtains on the Net, over and over to my friends.
